name: Your Computer
long_description: The letters on your keyboard are so worn out from hacking you've had to paint them back on with nail polish a few times. Time to get to work!

room_features.name: Disk Drive
room_features.description: You can load your CD-ROMs in here.

room_features.name: Panel
room_features.description: Your Computer's ultimate backdoor. You can add some sweet new mods through here.
